author: Laura Hoy
title: Donald Trump Mashes the Panic Button With Unhinged Ventilator Tweet
description: An unhinged Donald Trump is mashing the panic button to try to make U.S. companies shoulder the blame for the coronavirus outbreak. The post Donald Trump Mashes the Panic Button With Unhinged Ventilator Tweet appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Donald Trump is starting to panic as the coronavirus threat becomes too large to ignore.
  • He shifted blame to U.S. companies in a desperate tweet.
  • His failure to mitigate this health crisis is bubbling to the surface.
